thread.title: Intense portraits of 2015-16 Cavaliers players from media day
thread.title_full: Intense portraits of 2015-16 Cavaliers players from media day | cleveland.com

author: David Petkiewicz, Northeast Ohio Media Group
title: Intense portraits of 2015-16 Cavaliers players from media day
text:
NEOMG photographer Joshua Gunter attended the 2015 Cavaliers media day on Monday to capture the personalities of the Cavalier players.
Using creative lighting and artistic post-production techniques he was able to create these stunning portraits of the players.
